analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xedbfb6276e5d529f5afc81206fb65f868069dadb.sol#10-11)
LUCYD.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xedbfb6276e5d529f5afc81206fb65f868069dadb.sol#65)
